front.title: A Simple Caching Scheme for LDAP and X.500 Directories

abstract.t: This memo defines an object class and attribute type in support of asimple caching mechanism for use in LDAP and X.500 directories. Theobject class allows a simple 'time-to-live' attribute to be included inentries, enabling clients retrieving the attribute to tell when theother information they have retrieved from the entry should be thrownaway. The use of this scheme does not preclude the subsequent or addi-tional use of other more complicated schemes, for example, allowing dif-ferent TTLs on individual attributes.
